name: camelids-b
description:
When not in use for small meetings, this room doubles as an in-office hairdressing salon.
The carpet in here feels strange underfoot.

inventory.detailedDescription: On the surface it's just a plain office carpet but it's a bit prickly.

inventory.name: hair
inventory.detailedDescription:
Fine hair trimmings of assorted colours and thickness.
None look long enough to do anything useful with.

attributes.defaultResult: They're too fine and embedded into the carpet to collect.
